title: Amazon’s ‘Manchester by the Sea’ and ‘The Salesman’ take home three Oscars
text:
Amazon’s ‘Manchester by the Sea’ and ‘The Salesman’ take home three Oscars Posted 
Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos even got a shoutout in Jimmy Kimmel’s opening monologue. Related Articles Manchester by the Sea won for Best Actor (Casey Affleck, who won despite resurfaced allegations of sexual harassment ) and Best Original Screenplay (Kenneth Lonergan). It was also Amazon’s very first nominee for Best Picture .
The Salesman , meanwhile, was named Best Foreign Film. Iranian director Asghar Fahadi declined to attend the ceremony due to President Donald Trump’s travel ban — the award was accepted instead by astronaut Anousheh Ansari, who read a statement from Fahadi denouncing “the inhumane law that bans entry of immigrants to the U.S.” 
Netflix didn’t go home empty-handed, either: Its film The White Helmets won the Oscar for Best Documentary Short. 0
